mutants.code:
def find_students_below_average(test_cases):
    results = []
    for test_case in test_cases:
        n = len(test_case)
        x = []
        p = []
        m = []
        for student in test_case:
            (X, P, M) = student
            x.append(X)
            p.append(int(P))
            m.append(int(M))
        avg = sum(m) * n
        below_average_students = [(x[i], p[i], m[i]) for i in range(n) if m[i] < avg]
        below_average_students.sort(key=lambda x: x[2])
        results.append(below_average_students)
    return results

def find_students_below_average(test_cases):
    results = []
    for test_case in test_cases:
        n = len(test_case)

        m = []
        for student in test_case:
            (X, P, M) = student
            x.append(X)
            p.append(int(P))
            m.append(int(M))
        avg = sum(m) // n
        below_average_students = [(x[i], p[i], m[i]) for i in range(n) if m[i] < avg]
        below_average_students.sort(key=lambda x: x[2])
        results.append(below_average_students)
    return results

def find_students_below_average(test_cases):
    results = []
    for test_case in test_cases:
        n = len(test_case)
        x = []
        p = []
        m = []
        for student in test_case:
            (X, P, M) = student
            x.append(X)
            p.append(int(P))
            m.append(int(M))
        avg = sum(m) / n
        below_average_students = [(x[i], p[i], m[i]) for i in range(n) if m[i] < avg]
        below_average_students.sort(key=lambda x: x[-2])
        results.append(below_average_students)
    return results
